title: Valentina’s notebook
content:
Summer 15. I think twins like and don’t like the same things. My mom and Aunt Alice are twins. Mom and Aunt Alice like green smoothies.

Fall 3. Mom and Aunt Alice went running together. They said they had a good time. Does it mean they love running? Hmm… Suspicious.

Fall 10. Dad brought back minced jackfruit pies for Mom and Aunt Alice. They told me they loved it.

Fall 13. Macy heated up pizza and I asked Mom what type of pizza she likes. She said she and Aunt Alice hated pizza. They HATE pizza. Aunt Alice loves olive oil. I have to find out if mom likes olive oil too.

Conclusion: I don't know why they hate pizza, because pizza is delicious. Adults are weird.

title: Letter from the Sanchez Parents
content:
Rafael,

Forgive your dad. He gets things mixed up sometimes. We know that your favorite dish is sashimi, and cauliflower casserole is Pablo’s, not yours. We’re sending fresh fish for you to make sashimi. Your uncle is going fishing next week. In the meantime, here is an onyx, which we KNOW is your other favorite item.

Sorry we missed your birthday. We love you.

Mom and Dad

title: Sunny’s Note #1
content:
3. Limit fishing channel subscriptions to 43.

4. Cut birthday present budget. Neighbors that love fish (free):
Scott (king red arowana, giant stingray, yellow moray eel)
Archie (in tacos)
Theo (same as Scott, plus green sawfish, anglers, and in tacos)
Bree (in tacos, just like Arch)
Valentina (in tacos too – so many fish taco lovers)
Yuri (frogfish, lobster)

title: Request from a Daughter
content:
Dad, how about getting some hot cocoa and mixed juice on the way home? Surely it won’t be much harder than getting Spring frittata for Ling. If not, I’ll settle for some warm meals from the tavern.
 – Leah

title: Old Starlet Digest article
content:
Island Notice

An unknown thief has been recently reported to have stolen from a local farm, taking crops and animal products, such as eggs and jugs of milk. Please report any suspicious activity to the local island authorities or the mayor.

The incident has been reported to occur between midnight and dawn. Please do not attempt to confront the thief.

Any kind of ramen

title: A Stern Warning
content:
Ratih,

I don’t care about your boat market near the lighthouse. Just make sure you pipe down at night. I already have enough trouble sleeping.
I’ll tell the mayor about your secret shenanigans if I have to.

Wataru

title: Don't Yuck Someone's Yum
content:
We all have different hobbies, TV shows we like, and favorite foods! Even if sometimes we don’t understand how our friends can like something we think is gross, remember never to yuck someone’s yum! Being kind is cool!

Here’s what we like. What do you like?

Randy: coffee, wine
Zoe: ice cream, cookies
Valentina: basil pesto pasta, pumpkin pie, starfruit, green curry
Archie: basil pesto pasta, ice cream, stones, Taco the dog, fish tacos, his dad
Oliver: basil pesto pasta, ice cream, smoked salmon

title: A Petition to Ban Durian from Public Spaces
content:
Spring 8
Dear Mayor Connor,

We, the undersigned, request that the pungent fruit durian be formally banned in public places due to its overwhelming smell. It has caused discomfort for those who dislike durian.

Thank you,
Frank J.
Pablo S.

title: Precious Shell
content:
Dear Mr. Claus,

Today I helped Dad arrange flowers for Mom. It was oh so sweet! I wish someone would give me flowers too someday.

PS: I want some from you for Christmas, too. Thank you. – Nina

title: Dear Santa
content:
Dear Klaus,

Today I helped Dad arrange flowers for Mom. It was oh so sweet! I wish someone would give me one too someday.

PS: I want one from you for Christmas too. Thank you. - Nina
